snippet: Venoco, a California oil company, said on Tuesday that a majority of outstanding shares voted in favor of a $770 million buyout that is being led by the company's chairman and chief executive, Timothy M. Marquez.
abstract: Venoco, a California oil company, said on Tuesday that a majority of outstanding shares voted in favor of a $770 million buyout that is being led by the company's chairman and chief executive, Timothy M. Marquez.
